item.name: OverrideMothershipPacification
item.description: The Dyson Mothership visiting this planet has sent a simple signal requesting nonaggression on this planet. We can overload this symbol and fire upon the Mothership at per second HaP cost.

item.name: MothershipPacification
item.description: The Dyson Mothership on this planet is currently hostile for one reason or another. We can transmit a signal requesting nonaggression, but the act of communicating with the Mothership directily will cost us HaP every second.

item.name: DestroyDysonNodeWeakest
item.description: The Dyson Mothership has some friendly Nodes built in this system. We can destroy these to claim the resources within, but our scientists predict a strong, but short term, response after doing so. This will destroy the lowest mark Node in the system.

item.name: DestroyDysonNodeStrongest
item.description: The Dyson Mothership has some friendly Nodes built in this system. We can destroy these to claim the resources within, but our scientists predict a strong, but short term, response after doing so. This will destroy the highest mark Node in the system.

item.name: StealDysonUnits
item.description: The local Protector Sphere golem has vulnerabilities we can exploit. If we manage to survive its aggression for 60 seconds, we should be able to steal the designs for the smaller Dyson units. If there are Dyson Nodes on the planet, we can keep the hacking going for longer by hacking into them as well, blowing up a singular Dyson Node and gaining more units every 30 seconds. We will only get one shot at this hack before the Sphere patches its defenses, making this hack impossible.

item.name: AwakenDysonPrecursors
item.description: Our scientists have detected a large sentient energy source in this ancient piece of Zenith technology. They believe we could either kill it for a quick boost in scientific research, or reenable it via hack for a much greater reward, at the cost of more than likely angering whatever lies within. Grants 20000 Science if completed.
